question: How many days do I have to submit an excuse for my student?
answer: A parent or guardian only has three days to submit documenation to excuse an absence; otherwise the absence is unexcused and will count toward their truancy limit.

question: What academic supports are in place at City High?
answer: Most classes at City High are team-taught and embed Teaching Associates and Learning Support in the classroom.
